thread.section_title: AllGifts.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AllGifts.ie | allgifts.ie
thread.title: Liz

author: Liz
title: Liz
text:
Hi,
I did not find the site very intuitive and the FAQ section did not cover my query. Up to this point I was unimpressed and would have been slow to use the site again.
BUT.. Than I used the chat facility and Sarah replied to my request quickly and with competence and created a fabulous impression of your service.
I would and will recommend the site for further use (we have lots of family abroad so this is an easy way for them to send gifts home).
